/usr/bin/c++  -std=c++11 -pthread -O3 -DNDEBUG CMakeFiles/screen-recorder.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/screen-recorder.dir/src/screen_recorder.cpp.o CMakeFiles/screen-recorder.dir/src/demuxer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/screen-recorder.dir/src/muxer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/screen-recorder.dir/src/decoder.cpp.o CMakeFiles/screen-recorder.dir/src/encoder.cpp.o CMakeFiles/screen-recorder.dir/src/video_encoder.cpp.o CMakeFiles/screen-recorder.dir/src/audio_encoder.cpp.o CMakeFiles/screen-recorder.dir/src/video_converter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/screen-recorder.dir/src/audio_converter.cpp.o -o screen-recorder   -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11.so  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libavdevice.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libavfilter.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libavformat.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libavcodec.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libswresample.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libswscale.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libavutil.so
